title: Crafting & Survival Sound Pack
description: The new Crafting and Survival brings you 479 files!
longDescription:
CRAFTING & SURVIVAL


Build, Craft and Survive!


The new Crafting and Survival brings you 479 files! These are carefully crafted and curated for games that must have studio-grade sound effects! The texture of the sounds is realistic and flexible for customization.


You will at once have a hold of tools, fire, weapons, cooking, harpoon, fishing, cooking, crafting, hunting, building, gathering, movement, smithing, materials, inventory, bag, building, metal, and wood (chopping, sawing, nailing and more), shotgun, mining, gathering herbs, digging, eating, cooking, tools, clothes, zipper, keys, lockers, glass, paper, coins, objects, matches, bush, explosion, and traps sounds.Â 


Plus the usual Vadi Sound craft and attention to detail!


Fresh survival, gathering, movement and crafting sounds, in 479 files in 24bit/96kHz .wav for games that must have studio-grade sound effects!
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 479

Number of Audio Cues: 479

Sample rate / bit rate: 24 Bit 96 Khz

Minutes of audio provided: 35:08

Mac: Yes

umentation: VIEW FULL SOUND LIST - PREVIEW
